name: Pozzo Jello Crusade
description: Developed by ToG, POZZO JELLO CRUSADE is the highly anticipated remake to the gruelling 2005 breakout hit. The unique old-school puzzle experience captivated imaginations of gamers worldwide with incredible challenge and intense emotional reward.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2 Ghz Equivalent Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512 mb Card DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 30 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2 Ghz Equivalent Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512 mb Card DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 30 MB available space
